description: Information about the current status of a node.

addresses.description: List of addresses reachable to the node. Queried from cloud provider, if available. Note: This field is declared as mergeable, but the merge key is not sufficiently unique, which can cause data corruption when it is merged. Callers should instead use a full-replacement patch.

allocatable.description: The node resources that are available for scheduling. Defaults to `capacity'.

capacity.description: The total resources of a node.

conditions.description: An array of current observed node conditions.

config.description: Status of the config assigned to the node via the dynamic Kubelet config feature.

daemonEndpoints.description: Endpoints of daemons running on the Node.

images.description: List of container images on this node

nodeInfo.description: Set of ids/uuids to uniquely identify the node.

phase.description: The recently observed lifecycle phase of the node. The field is never populated, and now is deprecated.

volumesAttached.description: List of volumes that are attached to the node.

volumesInUse.description: List of attachable volumes in use (mounted) by the node.
